nodes.text: Vorg Alsum was a male criminal who was a member of a sentient species. Alsum was serving a five year sentence on the Delrian Prison Planet for stealing a speeder. His profile in the New Republic prison registry was one of several that Marshal Carasynthia Dune looked at from her office on the planet Nevarro in around 9 ABY while searching for the profile of prisoner Migs Mayfeld.
Vorg Alsum's profile first appeared in "Chapter 14: The Tragedy," the sixth episode of the second season of The Mandalorian, which was released on December 4, 2020.
